Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli L361 (MIC=50 µM), Pseudomonas fluorescens (MIC>100 µM), Salmonella Salford (MIC>100 µM), Escherichia coli O:9 (MIC=60 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus cereus (MIC>100 µM), Listeria monocytogenes (MIC=40 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>100 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Subfragment 2 had weak antibacterial activity against L. monocytogenes and both E. coli isolates, being effective in the range of 40 to 60 µM.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial activity in bovine lactoferrin-derived peptides.
Literature.Author: Hoek KS, Milne JM, Grieve PA, Dionysius DA, Smith R.
